statements: SELECT * FROM rewards
SELECT reward_id, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100
SELECT staker_address FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_date DESC
SELECT count(*) AS total_rewards, sum(reward_amount) AS total_amount FROM rewards WHERE reward_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT AVG(reward_amount) AS avg_reward_amount, MIN(reward_amount) AS min_reward_amount, MAX(reward_amount) AS max_reward_amount FROM rewards
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100 ORDER BY reward_date DESC;
SELECT staker_address, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE staker_address LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY reward_amount ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT reward_id, staker_address, DATE_FORMAT(reward_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount < 50 ORDER BY reward_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(reward_amount) AS average_reward FROM rewards WHERE staker_address = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT reward_amount, reward_date FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM staking ORDER BY staking_date DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(staked_amount) AS total_staked FROM staking GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM rewards JOIN staking ON rewards.user_id = staking.user_id
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY reward_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(reward_amount) as total_reward FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT r.user_id, r.reward_amount, s.staked_amount FROM rewards r JOIN staking s ON r.user_id = s.user_id;
SELECT * FROM rewards r INNER JOIN staking s ON r.user_id = s.user_id WHERE r.reward_amount > s.staked_amount;
SELECT user_id, AVG(reward_amount) as avg_reward FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(reward_amount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_date DESC, reward_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY reward_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM staking WHERE staked_amount > 1000 ORDER BY staking_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM rewards JOIN users ON rewards.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY reward_date ASC, username DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount > 1000 ORDER BY reward_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, wallet_address FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM staking WHERE staked_amount > 500 ORDER BY staking_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(reward_amount) as total_reward FROM rewards GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_reward > 2000;
SELECT * FROM Rewards;
SELECT user_id, reward_amount FROM Rewards ORDER BY reward_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, reward_amount, reward_date FROM Rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100;
SELECT user_name, wallet_address FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, staking_amount, stake_date FROM Staking ORDER BY stake_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, wallet_address FROM Users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, reward_amount, reward_date FROM Rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, staking_amount, stake_date FROM Staking WHERE stake_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM rewards WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT reward_id, date_received FROM rewards ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount, date_received FROM rewards WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM rewards WHERE date_received BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date_received DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT reward_id, user_id, amount FROM rewards WHERE date_received >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM staking WHERE end_date IS NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT users.username, rewards.amount, transactions.amount FROM users INNER JOIN rewards ON users.user_id = rewards.user_id INNER JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
